implement_emergency_measures.title: Crisis Management
implement_emergency_measures.description: Maya implements the emergency rerouting protocols. Backup systems hum to life as power begins flowing through alternate channels. 'The brownouts are starting,' she reports, 'but we're maintaining basic service to critical areas. It's not sustainable long-term, but it buys us time to find and fix the real problems.'

choices.text: 'What areas are most vulnerable during these brownouts?'
'How long can we sustain this emergency mode?'
'We need to find the sabotage source while we still have time.'
'I should coordinate with other crisis teams about these limitations.'
